title: Global Application Processor Market Share, Size and Forecast Report 2015-2019: Radiant Insights, Inc
text: Global Application Processor Market Share, Size and Forecast Report 2015-2019: Radiant Insights, Inc Application Processor Market United States, 30 September 2015 -- An application processor is a SoC, designed to support applications running in an operating system environment such as Android, Apple iOS, Windows CE, or Symbian.An application processor is a SoC, designed to support applications running in an operating system environment such as Android, Apple iOS, Windows CE, or Symbian. As a battery occupies the maximum space in a mobile device, central processor unit, graphics processing unit, memory, as well as other sub-processors are integrated onto a single chipset, referred to as SoC. The ARM provides the architecture for the mobile application processor, and manufacturers use the architecture as the base for developing chipsets. Companies such as Qualcomm and Apple license the instruction set from ARM and develop their own processor based on ARM guidelines. However, some companies like Samsung license ARM's application processor design and use it directly. Access This Full Report @ http://www.radiantinsights.com/research/global-application-processor-market-2015-2019 Technavio's analysts forecast the global application processor market to grow at a CAGR of 2.42% by revenue during 2014-2019. Covered in this Report The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global application processor market for 2015-2019 along with a technologic overview of the market.
